prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with purple skin and a sleek humanoid shape.
Imagine a powerful legendary Pokemon with telekinetic abilities and a mysterious aura.
Show me an evolution of Mewtwo that has enhanced psychic powers and a more intimidating presence.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with a long, curling tail and piercing eyes.
Design a mythical creature that represents the ultimate power of psychic energy in nature.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique ability to manipulate time and space.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both elegance and strength, with a cool purple color palette.
